title: Terraform
pageDescription: Terraform — this is an open source software using the “Infrastructure as Code” (Infrastructure as Code, IAC) approach, created by Hashicorp.It allows users to determine the infrastructure using the declarative language of the JSON -based configuration.
shortDescription: Terraform — open source software “Infrastructure as Code” (Infrastructure as Code, IAC)
markdown: Terraform — this is an open source software using the “Infrastructure as Code” (Infrastructure as Code, IAC) approach, created by Hashicorp.It allows users to determine the infrastructure using the declarative language of the JSON -based configuration.
